description: HC Standard Error Reference Values for End-to-End Validation

ols_coefficients.description: OLS point estimates [_cons, d, x1, x2]

commands: regress y d x1 x2, vce(robust)  // HC1
regress y d x1 x2, vce(hc2)
regress y d x1 x2, vce(hc3)

hc0_se.note: Calculated from HC1: HC0 = HC1 * sqrt((N-K)/N)

python_manual_reference.description: Manual HC calculation using NumPy for cross-validation

hc4_reference.description: HC4 (Cribari-Neto 2004) - Note: Stata does not support vce(hc4)
hc4_reference.formula: omega_i = e_i^2 / (1 - h_ii)^delta_i, delta_i = min(4, n*h_ii/p)
hc4_reference.validation_source: Manual calculation using NumPy, equivalent to R sandwich::vcovHC(type='HC4')

tolerance.note: Stata uses fewer decimal places in display, so tolerance is slightly higher
